mapper.insert: insert into user (userId, userName, password, email, activeCode,activeStatus,role) values (#{userId}, #{userName},#{password},#{email},#{activeCode},#{activeStatus},#{role});
mapper.update: update user set userName=#{userName}, activeStatus=#{activeStatus}, email=#{email},password=#{password},role=#{role} where userId=#{userId} ;
mapper.select:

email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords} ,'%') OR userName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords} ,'%')

select * from user where (user.email=#{email} or user.userName = #{email}) and password=#{password} and role=1
select * from user where userName=#{userName} limit 1
